title: Full-Stack Developer (React/Vue.js + Laravel)
job_overview:
We are looking for a skilled Full-Stack Developer proficient in React.js or Vue.js (Frontend) and Laravel (Backend) to join our team. You’ll work on exciting projects, building scalable web applications with modern tech stacks. If you’re passionate about clean code, problem-solving, and delivering high-quality software, we’d love to hear from you!

* Key Responsibilities:
Develop and maintain frontend applications using React.js or Vue.js.
Build robust backend APIs and services with Laravel (PHP).
Collaborate with designers, product managers, and other developers.
Optimize applications for performance, scalability, and security.
Debug and troubleshoot issues across the stack.
Stay updated with the latest industry trends and best practices.

**** Required Skills & Qualifications:
* Frontend: Strong experience with React.js or Vue.js (State management, hooks, components).
* Backend: Proficiency in Laravel (Eloquent, Blade, API development).
* Database: Experience with MySQL/PostgreSQL.
* RESTful APIs: Building and integrating APIs.
* Git & Version Control: Familiarity with Git workflows.
* Problem-Solving: Ability to debug and optimize code.
* Good communication skills (English proficiency).

**** Nice-to-Have (Bonus Skills):
* Experience with Next.js/Nuxt.js.
* Knowledge of Docker, CI/CD pipelines.
* Familiarity with AWS/Google Cloud.
* Testing (PHPUnit, Jest, Cypress).

Working Hours:
-8 PST - 8am-5pm 
Upgrade to see actual info,8&h=Upgrade to see actual info&hf=1

**** Why Join Us*
* Work remotely with a flexible schedule.
* Opportunity to work on impactful projects.
* Collaborative and growth-focused environment.
* Continuous learning & career development.

**** How to Apply:
Interested candidates should share their resume/CV, GitHub/portfolio links.
